code.displayName: evaluation and management of patient at home

pertinentSupportingInfo.value: Patient's home is untidy and in state of disrepair

code.originalText: Cough productive of green sputum for 4 days

pertinentSupportingInfo.value: Contact social services and mental health to see if they are aware of Frank

pertinentCareEventCommentary.value: Reminder to self ring my old friend Dr Black at the local mental health hospital to see if he has any further info

pertinentDosageInstructions.value: Take one tablet 3 times a day for 7 days

body.p: Dr Fixit is called to visit Frank Smith. Frank was registered with another practice in the local area but his family have decided they were not happy with the care he was receiving. Dr Fixit has agreed to take him as a patient. He goes to see him on a home visit.

ul.li: Prior to going on the home visit Dr Fixit calls up Frank's record. He has no record of his own as he is a new patient. There has been no GP2GP transfer as Frank's old GP did not keep computerised records. The paper record has yet to arrive.
Dr Fixit arrives at Frank's home he notices that the house is in a state of disrepair, he hears a dog barking.
Dr Fixit rings the door bell, the dog continues to bark and there is no answer.
Dr Fixit decides to try the door, he opens it slightly and the dog sticks his nose out. Dr Fixit is confident around dogs so he calms the dog and walks in.
Inside he finds Frank in a back room sitting in front of the TV which is turned up high.
He manages to attract Frank's attention and the TV is turned off.
Dr Fixit spends time talking to Frank. Frank appears to be mildly confused. He is surprised that his dog has not gone for the doctor. He says that last week he bit the post man.
Dr Fixit asks if Frank is taking any medication or is seeing any other Health professional. Frank says that he was in the Local Mental Health hospital about 10 years ago.
Dr Fixit is worried about Frank and he feels that he needs to find out more.
Dr Fixit leaves Frank's house and returns to his surgery, where he enters information about the Care Event
